entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:57 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:57 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:57 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
